channel.title: Welcome to the Open Global Mind Forum!
channel.description:
Howdy! Look around and read some posts, then dive in and reply to some topics (or create your own).
For mailing list folks, "Categories" are almost like sub-lists. "Topics" are like email threads, with a new subject line.
For Slack folks, "Categories" are like Slack channels. "Topics" are like threads.
For help, post in the "[Help!](https://forum.openglobalmind.com/c/start-here/help/8)" category -- you can click the "+ New Topic" button, or reply to another topic.
If you get stuck, email Jerry (sociate@gmail.com) or Pete (kaminski@istori.com).
Thank you for being here!

item.title: Welcome to the Open Global Mind Forum!
item.dc:creator: Jerry
item.description:
Howdy! Look around and read some posts, then dive in and reply to some topics (or create your own).

For mailing list folks, “Categories” are almost like sub-lists. “Topics” are like email threads, with a new subject line.

For Slack folks, “Categories” are like Slack channels. “Topics” are like threads.

For help, post in the “Help!” category – you can click the “+ New Topic” button, or reply to another topic.

If you get stuck, email Jerry (sociate@gmail.com) or Pete (kaminski@istori.com).

Thank you for being here!
